title: CSSTemplates

metadata.description: Learn about CSSTemplates with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
CSS Layout Templates
We have created some responsive starter templates with CSS.
You are free to modify, save, share, and use them in all your projects.
Header, equal columns and footer:
Try it (using float) »
Try it (using flexbox) »
Try it (using grid) »

Try it (using flexbox) »

quiz.question: What is You?

quiz.question: Which best describes the main purpose of this c feature?
quiz.explanation: This feature serves multiple purposes in software development.

summary: This tutorial covers CSSTemplates concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use CSSTemplates effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of CSSTemplates and how to apply it in your projects.
